mezzanine_1.name: Mezzanine. West end.
mezzanine_1.descriptionPrimary: Access to 4,5,6,7 stairwells and escalators on this level in the middle of mezzanine. Shuttle Train to Times Square on this level through westward passageway

signs.name: North
signs.message: Exit to Grand Central Terminal and 42nd street

signs.name: South
signs.message: Exit to 42nd street and Pershing Square

signs.name: East
signs.message: Mezzanine East with elevators to 4,5,6,7 trains, stairwells to 4,5,6,7 trains, and exits to  Lexington Avenue and 42nd street

signs.name: West
signs.message: passageway to Shuttle train to Times Square

signs.message: Exit to Grand Central terminal and street level

signs.name: South
signs.message: Exit to 42nd street and Pershing Square

signs.name: East
signs.message: Mezzanine East with elevators and stairwells to 4,5,6,7 trains, and exits to Lexington Avenue and 42nd street

signs.name: West
signs.message: Shuttle train platform at far end of this passageway

signs.name: East
signs.message: Mezzanine with access to 4,5,6 and 7 trains and exits to Grand Central terminal and to street level

passageway_2.name: Shuttle Train Passageway. Middle of Passageway

signs.name: East
signs.message: Mezzanine with access to 4,5,6 and 7 trains and exits to Grand Central terminal and to street level

passageway_1.name: Shuttle Train Passageway. West End. Near Shuttle train platforms

signs.name: East
signs.message: Mezzanine with access to 4,5,6 and 7 trains and exits to Grand Central terminal and to street level

passageway_entrance_west.name: Shuttle Train Platforms start approx 200 feet ahead. Platform number 1 serving tracks 1 and 3 is slightly to your left at 10 o'clock.  Platform number 2 serving track 4 is slightly on your right at 1 o'clock.  There is no track 2. Next train leaves in [TrainLeaves]

shuttle_platform_3.name: Shuttle Train Platform area. All three tracks on this platform are Times Square bound. Caution: Trains stop approx 100 ft back before reaching end of tracks. To access 4,5,6,7 trains and Grand Central Terminal, use the East bound passageway. There are exit stairs to either side of the passageway entrance

signs.name: East
signs.message: Passageway to Grand Central Station and to main mezzanine serving 4,5,6,7 trains on lower levels

signs.name: West
signs.message: Two platforms extending westward with tracks on either side. Tracks are numbered 1,2,3 counting left to right. Caution at tracks: Trains stop approx 100 ft before reaching end of tracks
